articles.author: Leslie Josephs
articles.title: Southwest and American airlines raise sales outlooks, shares jump - CNBC
articles.description: Southwest and American airlines forecast stronger-than-expected revenue for the fourth quarter.
articles.content:
Southwest Airlines and American Airlines raised their fourth-quarter forecasts on Thursday, citing strong demand and higher fares, sending shares in the carriers higher.
Southwest said in a securiti… [+1328 chars]
